DOC.brief_title: Positron-Emission Tomography With Vesicular Monoamine Transporter Ligand ( 18F-DTBZ ) In Healthy Elderly And Young Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective protocol ass possible age-dependent decline striatal 18F-DTBZ uptake healthy subject . This study expect completed period 2 year .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female age 20 year 80 year . 2 . Subjects without significant neuropsychiatric disorder evaluation Neurologist . 3 . Subjects provide write informed consent prior study entry . If subject incapable informed consent , caregiver may consent behalf subject ( subject must still confirm assent ) . 1 . Pregnancy breast feed . 2 . Significant recent ( within 6 month ) history neurological ( include stroke brain trauma ) psychiatric disorder . 3 . Alcohol substance abuse within last year . 4 . Parkinson 's disease brain degenerative disease ( spinocerebellar ataxia , Wilson 's disease , hydrocephalus , multiple infarction , history severe head injury intracranial operation . 5 .
